item.title: 'We shouldn't ignore this:' Longtime investor Rebecca Patterson warns Trump could damage Fed independence
item.description: Politicizing the Fed could have long-term economic consequences, according to former Bridgewater Associates chief investment strategist Rebecca Patter...

item.title: Here's what it really means for Trump to get control of the Federal Reserve board
item.description: Since taking office in January, Trump has placed the Fed directly in the crosshairs of executive power.

item.title: Fed's Waller, a candidate for chair, sees potential for half-point cut if labor market weakens further
item.description: Waller said he believes the Fed can use its power over rates to stave off further labor market weakening. "So, let's get on with it," he said.
